question: I am suppose to read seven times surah fatiha and eleven times surah ikhlaas. Please advise if this is permissable and substantiate with hadith
answer:
QUESTION
I have been advised to read 2 rakaats of salaatul istikharaa. In the salaah, I am suppose to read seven times surah fatiha and eleven times surah ikhlaas. Please advise if this is permissable and substantiate with hadith. Shukran
ANSWER


Share:

It is sufficient to recite Surah Fatiha and a Surah. Reciting Surah Fatiha seven times and Surah Ikhlaas eleven times is not proven from any authentic Hadith.

And Allah Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
